Description:
GUIException when copy and paste dataset in attached report.

Build number:2.2.0.v20070124

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report.
2. Select dataset new, right click and select copy.
3. Select Data Set node and right click, select paste.

Expected result:
Dataset new is pasted without GUIException.

Actual result:
GUIException throws but the dataset is pasted successfully.
